description:
- Palamute Golden Retriever Costume layered armor
Gives your Palamute companion the appearance of a gorgeous Golden Retriever! Good boy!

- Palico Forest Cat Costume layered armor
Makes your Palico companion look like a fluffy forest-dwelling feline friend!

- Novice Talisman
An item which will assist you in the early stages of your adventure.

Note: Layered armor is a "skin" which changes the appearance of the character without affecting their stats and abilities.
name: MONSTER HUNTER RISE Pre-order bonus Add-on Content
